title: Crystal Quartz Meditation Stones
description: Holding Crystal Quartz Meditation Stones in the palms of our hands during meditation encourages a deep state of meditation, an enhanced cleansing of our energy field, and an increased connection to beneficial universal frequencies waiting to support our aspirations and spiritual work.
cleaned_text: Crystal Quartz Meditation Stones $500 Holding Crystal Quartz Meditation Stones in the palms of our hands during meditation encourages a deep state of meditation, an enhanced cleansing of our energy field, and an increased connection to beneficial universal frequencies waiting to support our aspirations and spiritual work.
